name: taku
description: A booking system with API, Web, and Mobile apps

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:build
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --workspaces && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version" && git tag -a "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --workspaces && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version" && git tag -a "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.version:major: npm version major --workspaces && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version" && git tag -a "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.status: echo "Current version: $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && echo "API version: $(node -p "require('./api/package.json').version")" && echo "Web version: $(node -p "require('./web/package.json').version")" && echo "Shared version: $(node -p "require('./shared/package.json').version")"
